select count(*) from patrol_device_param pdp,patrol_device_account pda,patrol_device pd,patrol_device_type pdt where pdp.pdaId=pda.id and pda.pdId=pd.id and pd.pdtId=pdt.id
and pdt.name like CONCAT('%',#{pdtName},'%')
and pd.name like CONCAT('%',#{pdName},'%')
and pda.no like CONCAT('%',#{pdaNo},'%')
and pdp.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and pdp.createTime between #{createTimeStart} and #{createTimeEnd}

select pdp.*,pda.`no` pdaNo,pd.`name` pdName,pdt.`name` pdtName from patrol_device_param pdp,patrol_device_account pda,patrol_device pd,patrol_device_type pdt where pdp.pdaId=pda.id and pda.pdId=pd.id and pd.pdtId=pdt.id
and pdt.name like CONCAT('%',#{pdtName},'%')
and pd.name like CONCAT('%',#{pdName},'%')
and pda.no like CONCAT('%',#{pdaNo},'%')
and pdp.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and pdp.createTime between #{createTimeStart} and #{createTimeEnd}
order by pdp.createTime desc limit #{rowNum},#{rows}
